title: Aanuoluwatofunmi
author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
content: Am so curious about this aspect of development which concerns the use of ChatGPT in today's technology advancement whereby some developers are claiming the use of ChatGPT AI technology to perform a bitcoin transactions and also integrate with the use of the Bitcoin Lightning Network, how possible and what could be the challenges, risk and advantages.To me I want to believe that ChatGPT were as a result of centralized inventions from developers and institutions across the world and i don't know how the incorporation of this same technology be effectively fits in the bitcoin network and alligned with the protocol in making transactions as it has always been expected without any form of glitches.referencehttps://twitter.com/BTC_Archive/status/1677308911131475974?t=j77ucCjLErOyXj75d2w_sQ&s=19

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: Aanuoluwatofunmi on July 08, 2023, 11:17:18 AMAm so curious about this aspect of development which concerns the use of ChatGPT in today's technology advancement whereby some developers are claiming the use of ChatGPT AI technology to perform a bitcoin transactions and also integrate with the use of the Bitcoin Lightning Network, how possible and what could be the challenges, risk and advantages.To me I want to believe that ChatGPT were as a result of centralized inventions from developers and institutions across the world and i don't know how the incorporation of this same technology be effectively fits in the bitcoin network and alligned with the protocol in making transactions as it has always been expected without any form of glitches.I think you took the meaning of post wrong dear OP. As when I read your post I was also stunned to think that why would someone integrate GPT brain with Lightning network of BTC to make development and transactions. Because, as you said in the last paragraph that GPT is centralized and we all know whatever we search on GPT is being recorded even the results too. So, why would we trust this system with our money. I mean like can we even do that. Like integrate GPT in BTC block chain?We could make a bot using GPT and train that bot to perform transactions means we could make a auto trading bot. We could find bugs in the smart contract. We could make new smart contracts etc. Using the GPT knowledge and I have tried it too. And GPT is very good at it.What I found shocking is how we integrate GPT into blockchain and why we should do that. I chose were your concerns but in the source post, they were saying we could use gpt to make code to use in Developments

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: If you look at the pic in the tweet. It pretty much states how ChatGPT is going to help. CHAT-LN as it's called will be specialized in Bitcoin and LN development. It will have nothing to do with sending LN transactions or performing BTC transactions. It will mainly be used for scripting, troubleshooting, providing examples of working code etc.
